this is the biggest place BlueStyle diverges from the stuff in the julia-style guide (rather than simply adding to it)
Blue style says always snake_case.

In general, I think Base can get away with runnninggermancase because it rarely does anything very conceptually complex.
It doesn’t end up with too many cases like `generatefallbackemail`
where as packages are much more likely to have to describe things like that where runnninggermancase becomes hard to read
